summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1605, for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northwest, from West Forty-fifth Street to West Fifty-fifth Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks and wooden crosswalks, in accordance with plans prepared by the City Engineer under Ordinance No. 17167 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
